<goal name="<User>::"Create an graph model">
<goal name="<User>::"Create an i* SD/SR model" /> <goal name="<User>::"Create a GRL model" /> <goal name="<User>::"Create a NFR (vgraph) model" />

<goal name="<User>::"Edit a model graphically">
<goal name="<User>::"Edit an element's attributes" /> <goal name="<User>::"Edit a link's attributes" /> <goal name="<User>::"Edit a label" /> <goal name="<User>::"Remove/push an element into an expandable element" /> <goal name="<User>::"Expand/contract" /> <goal name="<User>::"Select/unSelect" /> <goal name="<User>::"Hide/unhide" /> <goal name="<User>::"Highlight/unhighlight" /> <goal name="<User>::"Copy/Paste/Delete" />
